code: import React from'react';var render=function render(){var condition=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var children=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;return!!condition?children:null;};export var If=function If(props){return React.Children.map(props.children,function(child){return React.cloneElement(child,{condition:props.condition});});};export var Then=function Then(props){return render(props.condition,props.children);};export var Else=function Else(props){return render(!props.condition,props.children);};export var When=function When(props){return render(props.condition,props.children);};export var Unless=function Unless(props){return render(!props.condition,props.children);};
